title: Hour 2: The Buc Stops Here
description:
Freddie Coleman and Courtney Cronin debate if LeBron James should be interested in a reunion with Kyrie Irving. Mike Tannenbaum joins the show to debate if Rob Gronkowski will stay retired. The crew talk about what kind of role should Kevin Durant play in Kyrie Irving's decision with the Nets. Freddie, Courtney, and Mike debate who should be the 49ers starting QB next season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Will Rob Gronkowski stay retired?
